purpose: The email announces the 9th Working Formal Methods Symposium (FROM 2025) scheduled for September 17-19, 2025, in Iași, Romania. It aims to gather researchers and practitioners in the field of formal methods to share new theoretical results, methods, techniques, and frameworks. The symposium will feature invited speakers and regular contributions, with important dates for paper submissions and notifications outlined. Topics of interest include various areas of computer science and formal methods, and selected papers may be invited for extended publication in a journal.
